Do you want to have all the #perl6 documentation locally, but don't want to go through the hassle of installing all needed stuff? Just download this @docker container https://t.co/PmPbrHusSb and spin it up. Or run directly: docker run --rm -it -p 3000:3000 jjmerelo/perl6-doc https://t.co/wyaVMOI9gt
